ui_control.name: data_migration_tool
ui_control.label: Is there a preference on data migration tool such as Oracle Goldengate or Azure DMS?
ui_control.placeholder: Enter preference for data migration tool

ui_control.name: downtime_tolerance
ui_control.label: What is your downtime tolerance for cutover? Some options include; one time cutover using a large downtime window, or minimal downtime approach.

ui_control.name: db_gateway_hetorgenous_conn
ui_control.label: Is there any database Gateways/Heterogenous database connectivity?

ui_control.name: migration_testing_details
ui_control.label: How migration testing would be carried out (e.g. Unit testing, Data validation, object validation)?

ui_control.name: performance_stress_testing_support
ui_control.label: How Performance/Stress testing will be carried out and what kind of support would be needed?

ui_control.name: performance_stree_test_tool
ui_control.label: What are the tools which going to be used for stress/performance testing?

ui_control.name: migration_accept_criterion
ui_control.label: What would be our criteria to conclude migration is successful? What is understanding of acceptable performance and functionality?

ui_control.name: dr_site_implementation
ui_control.label: How is current disaster recovery site implemented?

ui_control.name: dr_requirement
ui_control.label: What is expected disaster recovery needs to be implemented after migration?

ui_control.name: rollback_statergy
ui_control.label: In case of some failure after go-live, do we need to rollback to pre-migration state?
